bibl.title: Karnak: Evolution of a Temple.

London - New York, Routledge, 2006, 8°, xxvi-258 pp., nombr. figg. ISBN 978-0-415-40486-0 (hbk) / 978-0-415-40487-7 (pbk). $150 (hbk) / $46.95 (pbk).
